description.displayText: Josefina is very sweet and easy to get along with. Although she hadn't recently taken care of a newborn (4 week old), she was very gentle and tried her best with our son. She was very patient, kind, and soothing. He fell asleep and rested on her chest most of the time because she was so soothing. She also entertained our 5 year old, folded the laundry, and was eager to help out around the house when baby was sleeping.
